column4: I've been running Gentoo for more than a year, and the only benefit i see is for newbies to learn about the guts of a linux system. The gentoo documention is very good
yeah - I used Gentoo to throw myself into using open source...
I still think it's easiest to maintain apache servers that need special modules or configs on Gentoo
the lack of reverse dependencies makes Gentoo risky on servers, IMHO
